summary: Dev Patel  is a English movie and television actor.
full_text: Dev Patel  is a British actor, known for playing Jamal Malik in Danny Boyle's Slumdog Millionaire , for which he won a number of awards, including a Critics' Choice Award and a Screen Actors Guild Award. Patel is also known for his role as Anwar Kharral in Skins; as Sonny Kapoor in The Best Exotic Marigold Hotel and its sequel The Second Best Exotic Marigold Hotel; and as Neal Sampat in Aaron Sorkin's HBO show The Newsroom.
title: Dev Patel
